item.title: Anna Jaques Hospital ransomware breach exposed data of 300K patients
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Anna Jaques Hospital has confirmed on its website that a ransomware attack it suffered almost precisely a year ago, on December 25, 2023, has exposed sensitive health data for over 316,000 patients. [...]

item.title: Microsoft expands Recall preview to Intel and AMD Copilot+ PCs
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft is now testing its AI-powered Recall feature on AMD and Intel-powered Copilot+ PCs enrolled in the Windows 11 Insider program. [...]

item.title: Ultralytics AI model hijacked to infect thousands with cryptominer
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The popular Ultralytics YOLO11 AI model was compromised in a supply chain attack to deploy cryptominers on devices running versions 8.3.41 and 8.3.42 from the Python Package Index (PyPI) [...]

item.title: Blue Yonder SaaS giant breached by Termite ransomware gang
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​The Termite ransomware gang has officially claimed responsibility for the November breach of software as a service (SaaS) provider Blue Yonder. [...]

item.title: New Windows zero-day exposes NTLM credentials, gets unofficial patch
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new zero-day vulnerability has been discovered that allows attackers to capture NTLM credentials by simply tricking the target into viewing a malicious file in Windows Explorer. [...]

item.title: Crypto-stealing malware posing as a meeting app targets Web3 pros
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Cybercriminals are targeting people working in Web3 with fake business meetings using a fraudulent video conferencing platform that infects Windows and Macs with crypto-stealing malware. [...]

item.title: Nebraska man pleads guilty to $3.5 million cryptojacking scheme
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​A Nebraska man pleaded guilty on Thursday to operating a large-scale cryptojacking operation after being arrested and charged in April. [...]

item.title: Romania's election systems targeted in over 85,000 cyberattacks
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: A declassified report from Romania's Intelligence Service says that the country's election infrastructure was targeted by more than 85,000 cyberattacks. [...]

item.title: U.S. org suffered four month intrusion by Chinese hackers
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A large U.S. organization with significant presence in China has been reportedly breached by China-based threat actors who persisted on its networks from April to August 2024. [...]

item.title: US arrests Scattered Spider suspect linked to telecom hacks
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​U.S. authorities have arrested a 19-year-old teenager linked to the notorious Scattered Spider cybercrime gang who is now charged with breaching a U.S. financial institution and two unnamed telecommunications firms. [...]

item.title: Police shuts down Manson cybercrime market, arrests key suspects
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: German law enforcement has seized over 50 servers that hosted the Manson Market cybercrime marketplace and fake online shops used in phishing operations. [...]
